law.catch_line: The Board may issue a limited license for training to an applicant who:...

text.section:
The Board shall include on any limited license that the Board issues:
The name of the health care facility or program to which the individual holds an appointment; and
The expiration date of the limited license.

A limited license temporarily authorizes the licensee to practice podiatry, while the license is effective, only on:
Patients of the health care facility or program named on the license; or
Patients of a health care facility or program that is:
Affiliated for training purposes with the health care facility or program named on the limited license; and
Approved by the Board.
A limited license may be issued for a term of 1 year and may be renewed annually.
